mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notifications (user_id, title, message, type, is_read, related_url, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{message}, #{type}, false, #{relatedUrl}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 50
SELECT count(*) FROM notifications WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = false
mapper.update: UPDATE notifications SET is_read = true WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = false
